Question: John Joseph "Jack" this person (born April 22, 1937) is an American actor, film director, producer, and writer.
Hints: In 2010, this person was inducted into the New Jersey Hall of Fame.
This person lived next door to Marlon Brando for a number of years on Mulholland Drive in Beverly Hills.
This person has twice won the Academy Award for Best Actor, for One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest and for As Good as It Gets.
